issue_obverse_figure_description_s: crown with two mural elements, wing above crown cap to the left and right, above this crescent and star; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders; pointing upwards; earing consisting of three elements; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls;  to the left and right ball of hairs in the neck; both shoulders decorated with crescent and star; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast, two dots on the breast; star and crescent in left and right field; crescent  at 3 h, 6 h and 9 h; dotted border
issue_obverse_legend_s: 2 h l. i. hslwb ; 11 h l. o. ʼpzwn´|Husraw abzūn| “Khusro, increase”
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: head surrounded by flaming halo; crown cap, crescent above forehead; above ribbons, above uncovered korymbos; double pearl diadem, diadem ribbons commencing to the left and right behind the shoulders, pointing upwards; to the left and the right ball of hairs in the neck; neck-line of tunica edged with a row of pearls; double row of pearls running from the shoulders to the breast, two dots on the breast, dotted border; star and crescent in left and right field; crescent  at 3 h, 6 h and 9 h; dotted border; outer dotted border
issue_reverse_legend_s: ‘yl’n ‘pybm krt’l |Ērān apēbim kartār| “He frees Iran from fear”; RY 36
